thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Laura Talbert
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Laura Talbert

author: Laura Talbert
title: Laura Talbert
text: I have booked using discounted pre-packages trips, used an airlines vacations or just researched and booked my own trips so when someone suggested I use a travel agent. I thought I will never do that but I did and I am never going back. Not only did we get a good deal based on what I could find in my own, our itinerary was full of activities I would never have picked. These turned out to be some of the best things we did the whole trip. Not that we ended up needing to, but because we always had someone we could reach out too for help anytime, it provided an additional level of security and comfort, especially when you are literally half way around the world!
